mapper.select: select 이름 as name, 템번호 as itemno, 타입 as type, 가격 as price, 유저번호 as kkono from shop as s inner join item as i on s.`템번호` = i.`번호` where 삭제 = 'N'
select 이름 as name, 템번호 as itemno, 타입 as type, 가격 as price, 유저번호 as kkono from shop as s inner join item as i on s.`템번호` = i.`번호` where 삭제 = 'N' and 이름 like '%${char}%'
select 이름 as name, 템번호 as itemno, 타입 as type, 가격 as price, 유저번호 as kkono from shop as s inner join item as i on s.`템번호` = i.`번호` where 삭제 = 'N' and i.`유저번호` = #{kkono}
